bio: Association of young people who want to establish a startup
contributionDescription: Association of young people who want to establish a startup, I have an idea to develop a startup by creating a waste collection point, sorting and drying the waste, and then selling it to cement companies for fuel. This is because of the high amount of plastic waste in my area. I also have an idea to provide incentives in the form of optimism to introduce optimism to beginners. I want to demonstrate positive progress to the optimism community
impactDescription: Introducing optimism to the general public. This is because of the high amount of plastic waste in my area. I also have an idea to provide incentives in the form of optimism to introduce optimism to beginners. I want to demonstrate positive progress to the optimism community.
recategorizeReason: NO, the application is categorized as an individual but the description refers to a group of young people trying to establish a startup, which makes it sound more like a project.
pwCategorySuggestions: Tokenization Platforms, Supply Chain Management, Environmental Sustainability
pwFlaggedReason: The application should be flagged because it violates Rule 1 and Rule 10.1. The application promises future establishment of a startup and waste collection mechanism, and it does not demonstrate a contribution that required a minimum time commitment of 1 hour and which provided impact to the Collective.
